_header: Now the law is laid by clear conscience
Note: For simple poems on the same theme see 3067 and 3068.
Subjects: complaints, on evils of the time; evils of the time; punctuation poems; law
_description: On the Evils of the Time, a ‘punctuation poem’ — one 8-line stanza (ababbcbc)

OxfCCC261.First Lines:
Now the law ys lad be trew consciensffulfeld couetyse hath
                    domynacioun…
OxfCCC261.Last Lines:
…Men may fynd day nor nyght adulaciounNow reynyth trowth in
                    euery mannys syght

CULHh26.First Lines:
Nowe the lawe is ledde by clere conscienceffull seld Couetise hath
                    duracioun…
CULHh26.Last Lines:
…Men may fynd day ne nyght AdulaciounNowe reigneth treuth in
                    euery mannys sight
